topic.title: Installing the IHTSDO Workbench IDE with Windows XP

body.section:
Requirements The recommended hardware and software requirements for Microsoft Windows based machines are:
Windows XP (Service Pack 3) or later
3GB RAM
20GB free disk space
Java 1.6

Installing Most versions of the IHTSDO Workbench IDE are distributed for easy installation via a single installer executable file. Simply double-click on the installer and follow the directions. Wherever possible, the Workbench should be installed on a local disk, in order to maximise performance and to support off-line operation.
